00087 void catchterminate(int sig)
00088 {
00089   sigterminate = 1;
00090   fprintf(stderr, "... catched signal - terminate minimization\n");
00091   signal(sig, catchterminate);

00118 static struct {
00119   complex double* V  ;       // K-mixing eigenstates
00120   int dim;                   // dimension

00122   complex double* N;         // projected Overlap matrix elements

00138 #define M_2PI (2*M_PI)
00139 #define M_PI2 (M_PI*M_PI)
00140 
00141 inline static double dabs(double x) { if (x<0) return -x; else return x; };
00142 
00143 #ifdef ORIENTED
00144 static double lalpha0;
00145 static double lbeta0;
00146 static double lgamma0;
00147 
00148 inline static double mod2pi(double a) { return (a - floor(a/M_2PI)*M_2PI); }
00149 
00150 inline static double diffang(double a, double b)
00151 {
00152   return (M_PI - dabs(M_PI-mod2pi(a-b)));
00153 }
00154 
00155 int orientationinverted(double alpha, double beta, double gamma,
00156                         double lalpha, double lbeta, double lgamma)
00157 {
00158   // if we are away from beta = pi/2 only look at beta
00159   // if we are close to beta = pi/2 also look at alpha
00160   if ((diffang(beta, M_PI_2) > 0.1 && 
00161        diffang(M_PI-beta, lbeta) < diffang(beta, lbeta)) ||
00162       (diffang(beta, M_PI_2) <= 0.1 && 
00163        diffang(M_PI-beta, lbeta)+diffang(alpha-M_PI, lalpha) < 
00164        diffang(beta, lbeta)+diffang(alpha, lalpha)))
00165     return 1;
00166   else
00167     return 0;
00168 }
00169 
00170 
00171 void invertangles(double* alpha, double* beta, double* gamma)
00172 {
00173   *alpha = mod2pi(*alpha - M_PI);
00174   *beta  = M_PI - *beta;
00175   *gamma = mod2pi(M_PI - *gamma);
00176 }
00177 #endif

00180 static void mirrorSlaterDet(SlaterDet* Q)
00181 {
00182   int i;
00183   int Z=Q->Z; int N=Q->N;
00184 
00185   Q->Z=N; Q->N=Z;
00186 
00187   for (i=0; i<Q->ngauss; i++)
00188     Q->G[i].xi *= -1;
00189 }

00191 
00192 static complex double expect(int n, complex double* A, complex double* c)
00193 {
00194   int i,j;
00195   complex double res = 0.0;
00196 
00197   for (j=0; j<n; j++)
00198     for (i=0; i<n; i++)
00199       res += conj(c[i])*A[i+j*n]*c[j];
00200 
00201   return res;
00202 }
00203 
00204 
00205 static void gradexpect(int n, gradSlaterDet* dA, complex double* c,
00206                        gradSlaterDet* da)
00207 {
00208   int i,j;
00209 
00210   zerogradSlaterDet(da);
00211 
00212   for (j=0; j<n; j++)
00213     for (i=0; i<n; i++)
00214       addmulttogradSlaterDet(da, &dA[i+j*n], conj(c[i])*c[j]);
00215 }

00217 
00218 // perform K-mixing calculation and sort out "good" states
00219 
00220 static int cmpmerit(void* ap, void* bp) 
00221 {
00222   double a=*(double*) ap;
00223   double b=*(double*) bp;
00224   
00225   return (a<=b ? (a<b ? 1 : 0) : -1);
00226 }
00227 
00228 
00229 void kmixingstates(complex double* H, complex double* N, int j, double thresh, 
00230                    double* egood, complex double* Vgood, int* ngood)
00231 {
00232   complex double e[j+1];
00233   complex double V[(j+1)*(j+1)];
00234   int d;
00235 
00236   generalizedeigensystem(H, N, j+1, thresh, e, V, &d);
00237 
00238   // we got d eigenstates, filter out the noise
00239 
00240   // sort eigenstates according to energy and norm
00241 
00242   // calculate norms
00243   complex double N2[(j+1)*(j+1)];
00244   multcmat(N, N, N2, j+1);
00245 
00246   double n, n2, norm[d];
00247   int i, k, l;
00248 
00249   for (i=0; i<d; i++) {
00250     n=0.0; n2=0.0;
00251     for (l=0; l<j+1; l++)
00252       for (k=0; k<j+1; k++) {
00253         n += conj(V[k+i*(j+1)])*N[k+l*(j+1)]*V[l+i*(j+1)];
00254         n2 += conj(V[k+i*(j+1)])*N2[k+l*(j+1)]*V[l+i*(j+1)];
00255       }
00256     norm[i] = n2/n;
00257   }
00258 
00259   double maxnorm = 0.0;
00260   for (i=0; i<d; i++)
00261     maxnorm = fmax(maxnorm, creal(norm[i]));
00262 
00263   double mine = 0.0;
00264   for (i=0; i<d; i++)
00265     mine = fmin(mine, creal(e[i]));
00266 
00267   // merits
00268 
00269   struct merit {
00270     double val;
00271     int idx;
00272   } merits[d];
00273 
00274   // how should we sort the eigenstates ?
00275   // according to energy, according to overlap with intrinsic state ?
00276   // problematic as ordering may change during minimization
00277 
00278   for (i=0; i<d; i++) {
00279     merits[i].idx = i;
00280     if (creal(norm[i]) < MINNORMKMIX*maxnorm)
00281       merits[i].val = -100000.0;
00282     else
00283       merits[i].val = e[i]/mine + 0.1*norm[i]/maxnorm;
00284   }
00285 
00286   // sort according to merits value
00287   qsort(merits, d, sizeof(struct merit), cmpmerit);
00288 
00289   // now write good eigenvalues and eigenvectors into egood, Vgood
00290 
00291   i=0; while(i<d && merits[i].val > -100000.0) {
00292     egood[i] = e[merits[i].idx];
00293     for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
00294       Vgood[k+i*(j+1)] = V[k+merits[i].idx*(j+1)];
00295     i++;
00296   }
00297   *ngood = i;
00298 
00299 }
00300

00306   complex double V[(j+1)*(j+1)];
00307   int d;
00308 
00309   generalizedeigensystem(H, N, j+1, thresh, e, V, &d);
00310 
00311   // we got d eigenstates, filter out the noise
00312   // see sortEigenstates
00313 
00314   double norm[d];
00315   int i, k, l;
00316 
00317   for (i=0; i<d; i++) {
00318       norm[i] = 0.0;
00319       for (l=0; l<j+1; l++)
00320         for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
00321           norm[i] += conj(V[k+i*(j+1)])*N[k+l*(j+1)]*V[l+i*(j+1)];
00322     }
00323 
00324   double maxnorm = 0.0;
00325   for (i=0; i<d; i++)
00326     maxnorm = fmax(maxnorm, creal(norm[i]));

00331     double val;
00332     int idx;

00337     if (creal(norm[i]) < MINNORMKMIX*maxnorm)

00340       merits[i].val = -creal(e[i]);

00358 
00359 #ifndef MPI
00360 void calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp, 
00361                                     const Interaction* Int,
00362                                     int j, int par, int iso, 
00363                                     angintegrationpara* angpara,
00364                                     complex double* H, complex double* N, complex double* J2)
00365 {
00366   SlaterDet* Qpp = Work.Qpp;
00367   SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;
00368 
00369   int nang = angpara->n;
00370 
00371   reinitangintegration(Q, Qp, 0, 0, angpara);
00372 
00373   int k,kp;
00374   for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00375     for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00376       H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00377       N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00378       J2[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0;
00379     }
00380 
00381   complex double nme, hme, j2me;
00382   double alpha, beta, gamma, w;
00383 
00384   int i, ip, iiso;
00385   for (i=0; i<nang; i++) {
00386     for (ip=0; ip<=1; ip++) {
00387       for (iiso=0; iiso<=1; iiso++) {
00388         copySlaterDet(Qp, Qpp);
00389 
00390         getangintegrationpoint(i, angpara, &alpha, &beta, &gamma, &w);
00391         rotateSlaterDet(Qpp, alpha, beta, gamma);
00392 
00393         if (ip) invertSlaterDet(Qpp);
00394         if (iiso) mirrorSlaterDet(Qpp);
00395 
00396         calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Qpp, X);
00397         nme = X->ovlap;
00398         calcHamiltonianod(Int, Q, Qpp, X, &hme);
00399         calcConstraintJ2od(Q, Qpp, X, &j2me);
00400 
00401         for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00402           for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00403             H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/4*(ip ? par : 1)*(iiso ? iso : 1)*
00404               (j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*hme;
00405             N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/4*(ip ? par : 1)*(iiso ? iso : 1)*
00406               (j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*nme;
00407             J2[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/4*(ip ? par : 1)*(iiso ? iso : 1)*
00408               (j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*j2me;
00409           }
00410       }
00411     }
00412   }
00413 
00414 }
00415 #endif
00416 
00417 #ifdef MPI
00418 void calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00419                                     const Interaction* Int,
00420                                     int j, int par, int iso,
00421                                     angintegrationpara* angpara,
00422                                     complex double* H, complex double* N, complex double* J2)
00423 {
00424   // isospin projection not added yet !
00425 
00426   int nang = angpara->n;
00427 
00428   reinitangintegration(Q, Qp, 0, 0, angpara);
00429 
00430   int k,kp;
00431   for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00432     for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00433       H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00434       N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00435       J2[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0;
00436     }
00437   
00438   // direct contribution
00439   {
00440     int task = TASKHAMILTONIANOD;
00441     BroadcastTask(&task);
00442 
00443     BroadcastSlaterDet(Q);
00444     BroadcastSlaterDet(Qp);
00445 
00446     int todo = nang;
00447     int running=0;
00448     int done=0;
00449     int processor;
00450     MPI_Status status;
00451 
00452     // processor 0 is master
00453     double angle[mpisize][3];
00454     double weight[mpisize];
00455     double projpar[3];
00456   
00457     // which slaves are working, at beginning none
00458     int i;
00459     int working[mpisize];
00460     for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00461       working[i] = 0;
00462 
00463     complex double hme[2], nme[2], j2me[2];
00464 
00465     int next=0;
00466     while (done<todo) {
00467 
00468       if (next<todo && running < mpisize-1) {   // supply slaves with work
00469 
00470         // find empty slave
00471         for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00472           if (!working[i]) {
00473             processor = i;
00474             break;
00475           }
00476 
00477         getangintegrationpoint(next, angpara, &angle[processor][0], &angle[processor][1], &angle[processor][2], &weight[processor]); 
00478 
00479         for (int a=0; a<3; a++)
00480           projpar[a] = angle[processor][a];
00481 
00482         MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00483 
00484         working[processor] = 1;
00485         running++;
00486         next++;
00487 
00488       } else {                                  // collect results from slaves
00489 
00490         MPI_Recv(hme, 2, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 
00491                  MPI_ANY_SOURCE, TAGHAMILTONIANOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00492         processor = status.MPI_SOURCE;
00493 
00494         MPI_Recv(nme, 2, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 
00495                  processor, TAGOVLAPOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00496         MPI_Recv(j2me, 2, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 
00497                processor, TAGANGULARMOMENTUMOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00498 
00499         complex double w;
00500         for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00501           for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00502             w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00503               Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00504 
00505             H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/4*(hme[0] + par* hme[1]);
00506             N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/4*(nme[0] + par* nme[1]);
00507             J2[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/4*(j2me[0] + par* j2me[1]);
00508           }
00509 
00510         working[processor] = 0;
00511         running--;
00512         done++;
00513       }
00514     }
00515 
00516     // tell slaves we have finished
00517     projpar[0] = -1.0;
00518     for (processor=1; processor<mpisize; processor++) {
00519       MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00520     }   
00521   }
00522 
00523   // contribution from mirror Slaterdet
00524   {
00525     int task = TASKHAMILTONIANOD;
00526     BroadcastTask(&task);
00527 
00528     SlaterDet* Qpp = Work.Qpp;
00529     copySlaterDet(Q, Qpp);
00530     mirrorSlaterDet(Qpp);
00531 
00532     BroadcastSlaterDet(Q);
00533     BroadcastSlaterDet(Qpp);
00534 
00535     int todo = nang;
00536     int running=0;
00537     int done=0;
00538     int processor;
00539     MPI_Status status;
00540 
00541     // processor 0 is master
00542     double angle[mpisize][3];
00543     double weight[mpisize];
00544     double projpar[3];
00545   
00546     // which slaves are working, at beginning none
00547     int i;
00548     int working[mpisize];
00549     for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00550       working[i] = 0;
00551 
00552     complex double hme[2], nme[2], j2me[2];
00553 
00554     int next=0;
00555     while (done<todo) {
00556 
00557       if (next<todo && running < mpisize-1) {   // supply slaves with work
00558 
00559         // find empty slave
00560         for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00561           if (!working[i]) {
00562             processor = i;
00563             break;
00564           }
00565 
00566         getangintegrationpoint(next, angpara, &angle[processor][0], &angle[processor][1], &angle[processor][2], &weight[processor]); 
00567 
00568         for (int a=0; a<3; a++)
00569           projpar[a] = angle[processor][a];
00570 
00571         MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00572 
00573         working[processor] = 1;
00574         running++;
00575         next++;
00576 
00577       } else {                                  // collect results from slaves
00578 
00579         MPI_Recv(hme, 2, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 
00580                  MPI_ANY_SOURCE, TAGHAMILTONIANOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00581         processor = status.MPI_SOURCE;
00582 
00583         MPI_Recv(nme, 2, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 
00584                  processor, TAGOVLAPOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00585         MPI_Recv(j2me, 2, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 
00586                processor, TAGANGULARMOMENTUMOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00587 
00588         complex double w;
00589         for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00590           for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00591             w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00592               Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00593 
00594             H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/4*iso*(hme[0] + par* hme[1]);
00595             N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/4*iso*(nme[0] + par* nme[1]);
00596             J2[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/4*iso*(j2me[0] + par* j2me[1]);
00597           }
00598 
00599         working[processor] = 0;
00600         running--;
00601         done++;
00602       }
00603     }
00604 
00605     // tell slaves we have finished
00606     projpar[0] = -1.0;
00607     for (processor=1; processor<mpisize; processor++) {
00608       MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00609     }   
00610   }
00611 
00612 }
00613 #endif

00616 #ifndef MPI
00617 void calcgradprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp, 
00618                                         const Interaction* Int,
00619                                         int j, int par, int iso,
00620                                         angintegrationpara* angpara,
00621                                         complex double* H, complex double* N,
00622                                         gradSlaterDet* dH, gradSlaterDet* dN)
00623 {
00624   SlaterDet* Qpp = Work.Qpp;
00625   SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;
00626   gradSlaterDet* dh = Work.dhproj;
00627   gradSlaterDet* dn = Work.dnproj;
00628   gradSlaterDetAux* dX = Work.dX;
00629 
00630   int nang = angpara->n;
00631 
00632   reinitangintegration(Q, Qp, 0, 0, angpara);
00633 
00634   int k,kp;
00635   for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00636     for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00637       H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00638       N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00639       zerogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)]);
00640       zerogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)]);
00641     }
00642 
00643   double alpha, beta, gamma, w;
00644 
00645   int i, ip, iiso;
00646   for (i=0; i<nang; i++) {
00647     for (ip=0; ip<=1; ip++) {
00648       for (iiso=0; iiso<=1; iiso++) {
00649         copySlaterDet(Qp, Qpp);
00650 
00651         getangintegrationpoint(i, angpara, &alpha, &beta, &gamma, &w);
00652         rotateSlaterDet(Qpp, alpha, beta, gamma);
00653 
00654         if (ip) invertSlaterDet(Qpp);
00655         if (iiso) mirrorSlaterDet(Qpp);
00656 
00657         calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Qpp, X);
00658         calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Qpp, X, dX);
00659         calcgradOvlapod(Q, Qpp, X, dX, dn);
00660         dn->val = X->ovlap;
00661         calcgradHamiltonianod(Int, Q, Qpp, X, dX, dh);
00662 
00663         for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00664           for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00665 
00666             H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/4*(ip ? par : 1)*(iiso ? iso : 1)*
00667               (j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*dh->val;
00668             N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/4*(ip ? par : 1)*(iiso ? iso : 1)*
00669               (j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*dn->val;
00670 
00671             addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dh, 
00672                                    w/4*(ip ? par : +1)*(iiso ? iso : 1)*
00673                                    (j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma));
00674             addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dn, 
00675                                    w/4*(ip ? par : +1)*(iiso ? iso : 1)*
00676                                    (j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma));
00677           }
00678       }
00679     }
00680   }
00681 
00682 }
00683 #endif
00684 
00685 #ifdef MPI
00686 void calcgradprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp, 
00687                                         const Interaction* Int,
00688                                         int j, int par, int iso,
00689                                         angintegrationpara* angpara,
00690                                         complex double* H, complex double* N,
00691                                         gradSlaterDet* dH, gradSlaterDet* dN)
00692 {
00693   // isospin projection not added yet !
00694   gradSlaterDet* dh = Work.dhproj;
00695   gradSlaterDet* dn = Work.dnproj;
00696 
00697   int nang = angpara->n;
00698 
00699   reinitangintegration(Q, Qp, 0, 0, angpara);
00700 
00701   int k,kp;
00702   for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00703     for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00704       H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00705       N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00706       zerogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)]);
00707       zerogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)]);
00708     }
00709 
00710   // direct contribution
00711   {
00712     int task = TASKGRADHAMILTONIANOD;
00713     BroadcastTask(&task);
00714 
00715     BroadcastSlaterDet(Q);
00716     BroadcastSlaterDet(Qp);
00717 
00718     int todo = nang;
00719     int running=0;
00720     int done=0;
00721     int processor;
00722     MPI_Status status;
00723 
00724     // processor 0 is master
00725     double angle[mpisize][3];
00726     double weight[mpisize];
00727     double projpar[3];
00728   
00729     // which slaves are working, at beginning none
00730     int i;
00731     int working[mpisize];
00732     for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00733       working[i] = 0;
00734 
00735     int next=0;
00736     while (done<todo) {
00737 
00738       if (next<todo && running < mpisize-1) {   // supply slaves with work
00739 
00740         // find empty slave
00741         for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00742           if (!working[i]) {
00743             processor = i;
00744             break;
00745           }
00746 
00747         getangintegrationpoint(next, angpara, &angle[processor][0], &angle[processor][1], &angle[processor][2], &weight[processor]); 
00748         for (int k=0; k<3; k++)
00749           projpar[k] = angle[processor][k];
00750 
00751         MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00752 
00753         working[processor] = 1;
00754         running++;
00755         next++;
00756 
00757       } else {                                  // collect results from slaves
00758 
00759         // wait for first value, identify slave, then recv all the other stuff from this slave
00760 
00761         complex double w;
00762 
00763         MPI_Recv(&dh->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, MPI_ANY_SOURCE, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00764 
00765         processor = status.MPI_SOURCE;
00766 
00767         MPI_Recv(dh->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00768                  MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00769 
00770         for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00771           for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00772             w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00773               Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00774 
00775             H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/4* dh->val;
00776             addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dh, w/4);
00777           }    
00778 
00779         MPI_Recv(&dh->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, processor, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00780         MPI_Recv(dh->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00781                  MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00782 
00783         for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00784           for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00785             w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00786               Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00787 
00788             H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/4*par* dh->val;
00789             addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dh, w/4*par);
00790           }    
00791 
00792         MPI_Recv(&dn->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00793         MPI_Recv(dn->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00794                  MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00795 
00796         for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00797           for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00798             w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00799               Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00800 
00801             N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/4* dn->val;
00802             addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dn, w/4);
00803           }        
00804 
00805         MPI_Recv(&dn->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00806         MPI_Recv(dn->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00807                  MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00808 
00809         for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00810           for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00811             w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00812               Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00813 
00814             N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/4*par* dn->val;
00815             addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dn, w/4*par);
00816           }        
00817 
00818         working[processor] = 0;
00819         running--;
00820         done++;
00821       }
00822 
00823     }
00824 
00825     // tell slaves we have finished
00826     projpar[0] = -1.0;
00827     for (processor=1; processor<mpisize; processor++) {
00828       MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00829     }
00830   }
00831 
00832   // contribution from mirrored Slaterdet
00833   {
00834     int task = TASKGRADHAMILTONIANOD;
00835     BroadcastTask(&task);
00836 
00837     SlaterDet* Qpp = Work.Qpp;
00838     copySlaterDet(Q, Qpp);
00839     mirrorSlaterDet(Qpp);
00840 
00841     BroadcastSlaterDet(Q);
00842     BroadcastSlaterDet(Qpp);
00843 
00844     int todo = nang;
00845     int running=0;
00846     int done=0;
00847     int processor;
00848     MPI_Status status;
00849 
00850     // processor 0 is master
00851     double angle[mpisize][3];
00852     double weight[mpisize];
00853     double projpar[3];
00854   
00855     // which slaves are working, at beginning none
00856     int i;
00857     int working[mpisize];
00858     for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00859       working[i] = 0;
00860 
00861     int next=0;
00862     while (done<todo) {
00863 
00864       if (next<todo && running < mpisize-1) {   // supply slaves with work
00865 
00866         // find empty slave
00867         for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00868           if (!working[i]) {
00869             processor = i;
00870             break;
00871           }
00872 
00873         getangintegrationpoint(next, angpara, &angle[processor][0], &angle[processor][1], &angle[processor][2], &weight[processor]); 
00874         for (int k=0; k<3; k++)
00875           projpar[k] = angle[processor][k];
00876 
00877         MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00878 
00879         working[processor] = 1;
00880         running++;
00881         next++;
00882 
00883       } else {                                  // collect results from slaves
00884 
00885         // wait for first value, identify slave, then recv all the other stuff from this slave
00886 
00887         complex double w;
00888 
00889         MPI_Recv(&dh->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, MPI_ANY_SOURCE, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00890 
00891         processor = status.MPI_SOURCE;
00892 
00893         MPI_Recv(dh->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00894                  MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00895 
00896         for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00897           for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00898             w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00899               Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00900 
00901             H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/4*iso* dh->val;
00902             addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dh, w/4*iso);
00903           }    
00904 
00905         MPI_Recv(&dh->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, processor, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00906         MPI_Recv(dh->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00907                  MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00908 
00909         for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00910           for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00911             w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00912               Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00913 
00914             H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/4*iso*par* dh->val;
00915             addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dh, w/4*iso*par);
00916           }    
00917 
00918         MPI_Recv(&dn->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00919         MPI_Recv(dn->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00920                  MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00921 
00922         for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00923           for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00924             w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00925               Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00926 
00927             N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/4*iso* dn->val;
00928             addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dn, w/4*iso);
00929           }        
00930 
00931         MPI_Recv(&dn->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00932         MPI_Recv(dn->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00933                  MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00934 
00935         for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00936           for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00937             w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00938               Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00939 
00940             N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/4*iso*par* dn->val;
00941             addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dn, w/4*iso*par);
00942           }        
00943 
00944         working[processor] = 0;
00945         running--;
00946         done++;
00947       }
00948 
00949     }
00950 
00951     // tell slaves we have finished
00952     projpar[0] = -1.0;
00953     for (processor=1; processor<mpisize; processor++) {
00954       MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00955     }
00956   }
00957 
00958 }
00959 #endif
00960 
00961 
00962 void initWork(int j, int par, int iso,
00963               angintegrationpara* AngPar,
00964               const Interaction* Int,
00965               const SlaterDet* Q)
00966 {       
00967   int k;
00968 
00969   Work.Qp = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00970   Work.Qpp = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00971   Work.X = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDetAux));
00972   Work.dX = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDetAux));
00973 
00974   initSlaterDet(Q, Work.Qp);
00975   initSlaterDet(Q, Work.Qpp);
00976   initSlaterDetAux(Q, Work.X);
00977   initgradSlaterDetAux(Q, Work.dX);
00978 
00979   Work.dH = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00980   Work.dN = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00981     
00982   for (k=0; k<(j+1)*(j+1); k++) {
00983     initgradSlaterDet(Q, &Work.dH[k]); 
00984     initgradSlaterDet(Q, &Work.dN[k]);
00985   }
00986 
00987   Work.dhproj = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00988   Work.dnproj = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00989 
00990   initgradSlaterDet(Q, Work.dhproj);
00991   initgradSlaterDet(Q, Work.dnproj);
00992 
00993   Work.V = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00994 
00995   Work.H = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00996   Work.N = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00997   Work.J2 = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00998 
00999 }
01000 
01001 // perform multiconfiguration calculation with fixed intrinsic states
01002 // return eigenvalue #ival
01003 
01004 // assumes fix matrix elements to be available in Work
01005 
01006 void calcprojectedHamiltonian(const SlaterDet* Q,
01007                               const Interaction* Int,
01008                               int j, int par, int iso,
01009                               int ival,
01010                               angintegrationpara* angpara,
01011                               double* eintr, double* eproj)
01012 {
01013   complex double* H = Work.H;
01014   complex double* N = Work.N;
01015   complex double* J2 = Work.J2;
01016   complex double* V = Work.V;
01017   int dim = Work.dim;
01018 
01019   // Q is intrinsic state to be varied
01020   // orient properly
01021   // then calculate needed matrix elements
01022   // solve eigenvalue problem in smaller subspace spanned by K-mixing eigenstates
01023 
01024   SlaterDet* Qp = Work.Qp;
01025   SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;
01026 
01027 #ifdef ORIENTED
01028   double alpha0, beta0, gamma0;
01029 #endif
01030    
01031   complex double hintr, nintr;
01032 
01033   copySlaterDet(Q, Qp);
01034 
01035 #ifdef ORIENTED
01036   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
01037   calcOrientedOrientation(Qp, X, &alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
01038   if (orientationinverted(alpha0, beta0, gamma0, lalpha0, lbeta0, lgamma0))
01039     invertangles(&alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
01040   fprintf(stderr, "... (alpha, beta, gamma) = (%5.2f, %5.2f, %5.2f)\n",
01041           alpha0*180/M_PI, beta0*180/M_PI, gamma0*180/M_PI); 
01042   rotateSlaterDet(Qp, -gamma0, -beta0, -alpha0);
01043 #endif
01044 
01045   // intrinsic state
01046 
01047   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
01048 
01049   if (isnan(X->ovlap)) {
01050     *eintr = ENERGYPENALTY;
01051     *eproj = ENERGYPENALTY;
01052     return;
01053   }
01054 
01055   nintr = X->ovlap;
01056   calcHamiltonianod(Int, Qp, Qp, X, &hintr);
01057 
01058   // projected matrix elements for Qp
01059   calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(Qp, Qp, Int, j, par, iso, angpara,
01060                                  H, N, J2);
01061 
01062   // K-mixing for Qp
01063   double ed[j+1];
01064 
01065   kmixingstates(H, N, j, THRESHKMIX, ed, V, &dim);
01066 
01067   if (!dim) {
01068     fprintf(stderr, "no good eigenstate for Q !\n");
01069   }
01070 
01071   complex double N2[(j+1)*(j+1)];
01072   multcmat(N, N, N2, j+1);
01073 
01074   complex double hproj[j+1], nproj[j+1], n2proj[j+1], j2proj[j+1];
01075 
01076   int i;
01077   for (i=0; i<dim; i++) {
01078     hproj[i] = expect(j+1, H, &V[i*(j+1)]);
01079     nproj[i] = expect(j+1, N, &V[i*(j+1)]);
01080     n2proj[i] = expect(j+1, N2, &V[i*(j+1)]);
01081     j2proj[i] = expect(j+1, J2, &V[i*(j+1)]);
01082   }
01083 
01084   for (i=0; i<dim; i++)
01085     fprintf(stderr, "Q eigenstate %d: E = %8.3f MeV, n = %8.7f, J2 = %6.3f\n", i, 
01086             hbc*creal(hproj[i]/nproj[i]), creal(n2proj[i]/(nintr*nproj[i])), creal(j2proj[i]/nproj[i]));
01087 
01088   *eintr = hintr/nintr;
01089   *eproj = creal(hproj[ival]/nproj[ival]);
01090 }
01091 
01092 
01093 
01094 // gradient will be written to Work.dhproj
01095 
01096 void calcgradprojectedHamiltonian(const SlaterDet* Q, 
01097                                   const Interaction* Int,
01098                                   int j, int par, int iso,
01099                                   int ival,
01100                                   angintegrationpara* angpara,
01101                                   double* eintr, double* eproj)
01102 {
01103   SlaterDet* Qp = Work.Qp;
01104   SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;
01105   complex double* H = Work.H;
01106   complex double* N = Work.N;
01107   complex double* J2 = Work.J2;
01108   complex double* V = Work.V;
01109   int dim = Work.dim;
01110   gradSlaterDet* dH = Work.dH;
01111   gradSlaterDet* dN = Work.dN;
01112   gradSlaterDet* dhproj = Work.dhproj;
01113   gradSlaterDet* dnproj = Work.dnproj;
01114 
01115 #ifdef ORIENTED
01116   double alpha0, beta0, gamma0;
01117 #endif
01118 
01119   copySlaterDet(Q, Qp);
01120 #ifdef ORIENTED
01121   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
01122   calcOrientedOrientation(Qp, X, &alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
01123   if (orientationinverted(alpha0, beta0, gamma0, lalpha0, lbeta0, lgamma0)) {
01124     fprintf(stderr, "... angles inverted\n");
01125     invertangles(&alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
01126   }
01127   fprintf(stderr, "... (alpha, beta, gamma) = (%5.2f, %5.2f, %5.2f)\n",
01128           alpha0*180/M_PI, beta0*180/M_PI, gamma0*180/M_PI); 
01129   rotateSlaterDet(Qp, -gamma0, -beta0, -alpha0);
01130 
01131   lalpha0 = alpha0; lbeta0 = beta0; lgamma0 = gamma0;
01132 #endif
01133 
01134   complex double hintr, nintr;
01135   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
01136   nintr = X->ovlap;
01137   calcHamiltonianod(Int, Qp, Qp, X, &hintr);
01138 
01139   *eintr= creal(hintr/nintr);
01140 
01141   // projected matrix elements for Qp
01142   calcgradprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(Qp, Qp, Int, j, par, iso, angpara,
01143                                      H, N,
01144                                      dH, dN);
01145 
01146   // K-mixing for Qp
01147   double ed[j+1];
01148 
01149   kmixingstates(H, N, j, THRESHKMIX,
01150                 ed, V, &dim);
01151 
01152   if (!dim) {
01153     fprintf(stderr, "no good eigenstate for Q !\n");
01154   }
01155 
01156   complex double N2[(j+1)*(j+1)];
01157   multcmat(N, N, N2, j+1);
01158 
01159   complex double hproj[j+1], nproj[j+1], n2proj[j+1], j2proj[j+1];
01160 
01161   int i;
01162   for (i=0; i<dim; i++) {
01163     hproj[i] = expect(j+1, H, &V[i*(j+1)]);
01164     nproj[i] = expect(j+1, N, &V[i*(j+1)]);
01165     n2proj[i] = expect(j+1, N2, &V[i*(j+1)]);
01166     j2proj[i] = expect(j+1, J2, &V[i*(j+1)]);
01167   }
01168 
01169   for (i=0; i<dim; i++)
01170     fprintf(stderr, "Q eigenstate %d: E = %8.3f MeV, n = %8.7f, J2 = %6.3f\n", i, 
01171             hbc*creal(hproj[i]/nproj[i]), creal(n2proj[i]/(nintr*nproj[i])), creal(j2proj[i]/nproj[i]));
01172 
01173   *eproj = creal(hproj[ival]/nproj[ival]);
01174 
01175   // gradients
01176 
01177   gradexpect(j+1, dH, &V[ival*(j+1)], dhproj);
01178   gradexpect(j+1, dN, &V[ival*(j+1)], dnproj);
01179 
01180   multgradSlaterDet(dhproj, 1.0/nproj[ival]);
01181   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dhproj, dnproj, -hproj[ival]/(nproj[ival]*nproj[ival]));
01182 
01183 #ifdef ORIENTED
01184   rotategradSlaterDet(dhproj, alpha0, beta0, gamma0);
01185 #endif
01186 }                                 
01187

01189 
01190 static void copyxtopara(const double* x, Para* q)
01191 {
01192   int i;
01193   for (i=0; i<q->n; i++)
01194     q->x[i] = x[i];
01195 }

01197 
01198 void MinimizeDONLP2vappiso(const Interaction* Int, 
01199                            int j, int par, int iso, int ival, double alpha,
01200                            angintegrationpara* projpar,
01201                            const Constraint* Const, int nconst,
01202                            Parameterization* P, Para* q,
01203                            int maxsteps, int log, const char* logfile)
01204 {
01205 #ifndef MPI
01206   // handler for INT and TERM signals
01207   signal(SIGINT, catchterminate);
01208   signal(SIGTERM, catchterminate);
01209 #endif
01210 
01211   Min.maxsteps = maxsteps;
01212   Min.log = log;
01213   Min.logfile = logfile;
01214   Min.Int = Int;
01215   Min.j = j;
01216   Min.par = par;
01217   Min.iso = iso;
01218   Min.ival = ival;
01219   Min.alpha = alpha;
01220   Min.projpar = projpar;
01221   Min.Const = Const;
01222   Min.nconst = nconst;
01223   Min.q = q;
01224   Min.P = P;
01225 
01226   Min.Q = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
01227   P->ParainitSlaterDet(q, Min.Q); 
01228 
01229 #ifndef MPI
01230   // regular program execution or catched signal ?
01231   if (!setjmp(env))
01232 #endif
01233     FORTRAN(donlp2)();
01234 
01235   fprintf(stderr, "donlp2 terminated because of criterium %d\n",
01236           (int) FORTRAN(o8itin).optite + 11);
01237 
01238   copyxtopara(FORTRAN(o8xdat).x, Min.q);
01239 }
01240 
01241 
01242 void FORTRAN(ef)(const double* x, double* fx)
01243 {
01244 #ifndef MPI
01245   if (sigterminate)
01246     longjmp(env, 1);
01247 #endif
01248 
01249   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
01250   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
01251 
01252   double eintr, eproj;
01253 
01254   calcprojectedHamiltonian(Min.Q,
01255                            Min.Int,
01256                            Min.j, Min.par, Min.iso, Min.ival,
01257                            Min.projpar,
01258                            &eintr, &eproj);
01259 
01260   *fx = (eproj+Min.alpha*eintr);
01261   FORTRAN(o8cnt).icf++;
01262 
01263   fprintf(stderr, "\tme      E = % 8.3f MeV, Eproj = %8.3f MeV, Eintr = %8.3f MeV,\n", 
01264           hbc*(*fx), hbc*eproj, hbc*eintr);
01265 
01266 }
01267 
01268 
01269 void FORTRAN(egradf)(const double* x, double* gradf)
01270 {
01271 #ifndef MPI
01272   if (sigterminate)
01273     longjmp(env, 1);
01274 #endif
01275 
01276   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
01277   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
01278 
01279   double eintr, eproj;
01280 
01281   calcgradprojectedHamiltonian(Min.Q,
01282                                Min.Int,
01283                                Min.j, Min.par, Min.iso, Min.ival, 
01284                                Min.projpar,
01285                                &eintr, &eproj);
01286 
01287   // add gradient from intrinsic energy
01288 
01289   calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Work.X);
01290   calcgradSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Work.X, Work.dX);
01291   calcgradHamiltonian(Min.Int, Min.Q, Work.X, Work.dX, Work.dH);
01292 
01293   addmulttogradSlaterDet(Work.dhproj, Work.dH, Min.alpha);
01294 
01295   Min.P->ParaprojectgradSlaterDet(Min.q, Work.dhproj, gradf);
01296   FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf++;
01297   fprintf(stderr, "grad %3d: \tE = %8.3f MeV, Eproj = %8.3f MeV, Eintr = %8.3f MeV\n", 
01298           FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf, hbc*(eproj+Min.alpha*eintr), hbc*eproj, hbc*eintr);
01299 
01300 
01301   if (Min.log && !(FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf % Min.log)) {
01302     char logfname[255];
01303     sprintf(logfname, "%s.minvapp.%03d.log", Min.logfile, FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf);
01304     FILE* logfp;
01305     if (!(logfp = fopen(logfname, "w"))) {
01306       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", logfname);
01307     } else {
01308       fprintinfo(logfp);
01309       fprintf(logfp, "# step %3d: \tE = %8.3f MeV, Eproj = %8.3f MeV, Eintr = %8.3f MeV\n", 
01310               FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf, hbc*(eproj+Min.alpha*eintr), hbc*eproj, hbc*eintr);
01311       fprintf(logfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
01312       fprintf(logfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", Min.P->name);
01313       Min.P->Parawrite(logfp, Min.q);
01314       fprintf(logfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
01315       writeSlaterDet(logfp, Min.Q);
01316       fclose(logfp);
01317     }
01318   }  
01319 
01320 }

01323 void FORTRAN(eg)(int* i, const double* x, double* gxi)
01324 {
01325   if (!strcmp(Min.P->name, "FMD")) {
01326     *gxi = x[(*i-1)*NGAUSS+APOS]-MINIMUMA;
01327   }
01328 }

01336 void FORTRAN(eh)(int* i, const double* x, double* hxi)
01337 {
01338 #ifndef MPI
01339   if (sigterminate)
01340     longjmp(env, 1);
01341 #endif
01342 
01343   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
01344   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
01345 
01346   calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Work.X);
01347   Min.Const[*i-1].me(Min.Q, Work.X, hxi);
01348 
01349   fprintf(stderr, "\t\t\tme   %4s = %8.3f\n", 
01350           Min.Const[*i-1].label, Min.Const[*i-1].output(*hxi));
01351 
01352   *hxi -= Min.Const[*i-1].val;
01353 }

01356 void FORTRAN(egradh)(int* i, const double* x, double* gradhi)
01357 {
01358 #ifndef MPI
01359   if (sigterminate)
01360     longjmp(env, 1);
01361 #endif
01362   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
01363   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
01364 
01365   calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Work.X);
01366   calcgradSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Work.X, Work.dX);
01367   zerogradSlaterDet(Work.dH);
01368   Min.Const[*i-1].gradme(Min.Q, Work.X, Work.dX, Work.dH);
01369 
01370   Min.P->ParaprojectgradSlaterDet(Min.q, Work.dH, gradhi);
01371   fprintf(stderr, "\t\t\tgrad %4s = %8.3f\n", 
01372           Min.Const[*i-1].label, Min.Const[*i-1].output(Work.dH->val));
01373 }
01374 
01375 
01376 void FORTRAN(setup0)(void)
01377 {
01378   int i;
01379 
01380   FORTRAN(o8dim).n = Min.q->n;
01381   FORTRAN(o8dim).nh = Min.nconst;
01382   // in case of FMD parametrization use bound constraints for Re{a}
01383   if (!strcmp(Min.P->name, "FMD")) {
01384     FORTRAN(o8dim).ng = Min.q->ngauss;
01385     for (i=0; i<Min.nconst+1; i++) {
01386       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][0] = -1;
01387       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][1] = 0;
01388       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][2] = 0;
01389     }
01390     for (i=0; i<Min.q->ngauss; i++) {
01391       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][0] = 1;
01392       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][1] = i*NGAUSS+APOS+1;
01393       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][2] = 1;
01394     }
01395     for (i=0; i<Min.q->ngauss; i++) {
01396       if (Min.q->x[i*NGAUSS+APOS] < 0)
01397         Min.q->x[i*NGAUSS+APOS] = 1.0+1.0*rand()/RAND_MAX;
01398     }
01399   } else
01400     FORTRAN(o8dim).ng = 0;
01401   FORTRAN(o8stpa).analyt = 1;
01402   FORTRAN(o8stpa).cold = 1;
01403   FORTRAN(o8par).tau0 = 20.0;
01404   FORTRAN(o8par).del0 = 1.0;
01405   FORTRAN(o8rst).nreset = 20;
01406   FORTRAN(o8stpa).silent = 1;
01407 
01408   for (i=0; i<Min.q->n; i++)
01409     FORTRAN(o8xdat).x[i] = Min.q->x[i];
01410 }
01411 
01412 
01413 void FORTRAN(setup)(void)
01414 {
01415   FORTRAN(o8stpa).te0 = 0;
01416   FORTRAN(o8stpa).te1 = 0;
01417   FORTRAN(o8par).iterma = Min.maxsteps-1;
01418 }
